item.title: kernel development with nix
self-hosted infrastructure
item.description: TLDR: I use tailscale/zerotier to establish a smallish mesh network. I use envoy (not anymore, I now use nginx) as an edge router to forward L4 traffic. I mainly provision and manage services with nix, docker and sops. When it is absolutely required, I use k3s to deploy Kubernetes services. Traefik is used for routing, and authelia is used for blocking unauthorized access. To multiplexing protocols with a single port, I use aioproxy.
